text: Eric Newman (24 November 1924 — January 1971) was an English footballer who played as a goalkeeper. ==Career== Newman began his career playing for non- league clubs Whitton United and Romford. In 1945, Newman signed for Ipswich Town, before leaving to join Arsenal in October 1946. On 8 September 1950, Newman re-signed for Ipswich, making 18 Football League appearances in three years at the club. Following his second spell with Ipswich, Newman signed for Chelmsford City. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:English footballers Category:Footballers from Romford Category:Whitton United F.C. players Category:Romford F.C. players Category:Ipswich Town F.C. players Category:Arsenal F.C. players Category:Chelmsford City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Eric Newman (footballer)
